author: Danielle Pino
comment: I've had this app for years. Every time I switch phones, or my phone updates, there's a new issue with the app. Some get solved, others just annoy me daily. I have to force stop the app daily because it isn't responding or the speaker takes over a minute to come on, if it comes on at all. The app is ok but it requires patience.
title: Works, sometimes.

author: Becky Hudy
comment: Used this app for over a year and it was working fine until last night. We use it as a baby monitor in our toddler's room and last night mine stopped working. My husband has a different app on his phone and his was working just fine. We quadruple checked my settings and everything was exactly right. Uninstalling and finding something else.
title: No longer working

author: Richard Murrant
comment: I eventually worked out that it needs the http port rather than rtsp or onvif, but then all I can get is a still. No ptz functionality. Using a vstarcam c33-x4. If there's something I can do to get this to work, please let me know!
title: Can't get it to work

author: Ashod Martirossian
comment: I just downloaded the app and was able to connect from the second try. First used my DynDNS URL but was not able to connect. Then I used the ip address and it connects right away.  Will check the URL later and will give 5 stars if it works. Haven't checked the audio yet. So far this was the only app I got that can control the camera movement and settings. I have tried 5 others before: or nothing or the picture only.
title: Works well so far

author: Timothy Carroll
comment: Foscam had a first party app and they completely broke it.  I looked for alternatives and found dozens of apps with different names that was the same exact app (scam).  Then I found this.  This app is fantastic.  It does everything I want, has unintrusive ads plus a premium option.  THANK YOU.
title: Finally found a great one!

author: Ken Smith
comment: Works perfect on my Samsung S5 but on my Samsung Tab 3 I made a mistake on the ip address it could not find the camera but did find my other camera no problem. I try and change my mistake but no icon for the content menu. I have looked and pushed ever icon I can find but no success. Some help would be greatly appreciated. There is no icon for the context menu you mention.

reply.author: SoratSoft
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience. To correct the issue, you have to find "Connection Settings" from the context menu.

title: Works great on my phone but tablet

author: Ever Right
comment: If it's stable will be a great app of all. I tried many similar apps none of them works only this one can connect to my cameras from different makers. Only issue is it freezes and no response randomly. Otherwise this app is the best.

author: Jamie Guile
comment: I've used this app for my Foscam for a few months now, it is simple and easy to use and set up. Keep in mind that "buggy" and "in a place with a low wi-fi signal" are 2 different things. Low signals make the controls jumpy, just the nature of the beast. My only complaint is the audio lag. It increases over time and is easily reset by toggling speaker on and off, but overnight can be off by about 10 seconds. Love seeing the camera feed on my watch!
title: Android Wear functionality is great!

author: Terry M
comment: Great app, been using it for years. However, its in desperate need for Android 7.0 (Nougat) support. App lags, freezes and the camera moving joystick becomes unresponsive when being run on 7.0. Please fix soon & I'll gladly switch to a 5* review.

The only issue I have is that the audio is loud or soft randomly for no apparent reason. Sometimes I open the app and it's super quiet, sometimes it's nice and loud. There's no rhyme or reason to it. Also, even though I have it set to keep on audio when leaving the app, it cuts off quite frequently....meaning I have to constantly turn on the screen just to hear audio. I have several 'background audio' apps, and this is the only one that doesn't work.
title: Can't stand it anymore

author: P Coughlan
comment: Works ok until you try to change some settings like Brightness and contrast! And the picture get screwed with no return!  Please help me re adjust the settings!!!!
title: Very unreliable app

author: Nick Mason
comment: I have 5 cameras. 1 Winbook from micro center and 4 kaicong. Audio works with the micro center branded one but not the kaicong. Pan and tilt works great on the 4 kaicong cams that have this feature. Patrolling does not work on the kaicong cameras either. I would pay for it if I could use all the features with all my cams.   This app needs an update. Issues with android 7.0. Freezes upon opening and have to wait to use pan/tilt or switching cameras for about a minute. Some force closes as well.

Good; however, small problem. After using mic to speak to someone then terminating the app, microphone for Google won't work. Requires phone restart. More noticeable indicator for speaker and mic would be nice enhancement, too.

author: Dan Molceanu
comment: Please fix ASAP! Used to work perfectly until my Galaxy s7 upgraded to Nougat. Now it freezes every single time I open it and crashes. Why does it take so long for a fix?

author: Joshua Sweeney
comment: This app is phenomenal! I have some Foscam FI9821 V2 cameras, and I've tried a bunch of different apps before I finally found this one.   This app was extremely easy to setup, and the connection the the camera was fast and responsive, even on a slower network like a 3G network.   The user interface is clean and intuitive. I really like the virtual joystick for controlling pan/tilt, none of other apps I tried have that nifty feature.  This is app is so awesome and easy to use that made the in-app purchase to get rid of the ads, and support the developer, within 10 minutes of setting up all my cameras. Totally worth $3.   Thank you, SoratSoft, for making such a fantastic app.

author: Renee Montgomery
comment: It use to be a decent app, but now,  it's junk. Works when it wants to work, takes forever for the sound and mic to engage, if at all. When trying to scan area, it just freezes.

author: Umesh Kodippili
comment: Gone from 4 stars to 1 to get developers attention. App frequently crashes or stop responding. Controls are laggy. Pixel 2 XL.

reply.author: SoratSoft
reply.content: The inverted h-control issue has now been fixed in version 3.3.3 by the new option in Screen/Control Settings dialog.

author: Te Baeg
comment: Apparently constantly freezes. Other than that it has the features of a top app.  Please fix and I will upgrade the rating. Currently using another app

author: Dave Hoelke
comment: My insteon hp ip cam works fine on their app,  and on IP cam viewer app.  But insteon doesn't have audio, and ip cam viewer didn't allow me to leave  my home wifi.  I was hoping this would fix both,  but can't even get it running.
title: Never got it running

author: steven michael
comment: I've used this app for several years with 3 Foscam cameras at remote locations.  Connection is fast and reliable, and controls are fairly complete and very easy to use.  Wish it had focal length adjustment for my newest camera, from wide angle to telephoto.
title: Reliable for several years

author: Steph L
comment: Zero response from support how to add second camera/additional settings for both on and off home network. Pretty useless when I have to change settings each time to see camera depending if I'm on home WiFi or not... gotta be better apps out there!!

author: Michael Mencel
comment: Still freezes on the 6P. Nice when it works for 5 seconds but freezes after that.
title: Unreliable on marshmallow

author: Dave Allred
comment: Tried 20 apps since Foscam broke (and removed audio) from there official apps update: on Nexus 6p it crashes often

author: Jeff Z
comment: I get image, but the app does not respond to selections. Cannot pan, listen or select options
title: Doesn't work on Droid Turbo2

author: bob gasman
comment: Searching for a ip camera app that works with a mic is like searching for a needle in a haystack all my other apps work fine with my cam this is the one I need as I need the mic to work and it's the only one that won't work on my cam
title: Won't work

author: Jiajian Gu
comment: Tring to set it up but dont know where to  find the port number (required for connection setting) of the camera. I am using it with wireless connection

reply.author: SoratSoft
reply.content: Please try the default port number 80. Otherwise, try finding it by running the  utility app on your PC which came with your IP camera.

title: What number should I enter for port#

author: Lisa Johnson
comment: Tried several others first with my Foscam camera.  This one worked and was easy to set up and use.
title: First One That Worked for Me!

author: Eric Hendrickson
comment: Works fine in single cam view but crashes when you go to 4 cam split screen view.
title: Crashes on multi view

author: Durvi Doshi
comment: Sometimes works and sometimes doesn't work at all.. it works everywhere else but not on this app for some reason. Horrible app.. very unreliable.
title: Very unstable

author: Justin Cuomo
comment: Controls for app seem to stick/hang on Marshmallow 6.0 (Nexus 6p). App keeps freezing and prompts show up to shut down hanging app. Please check. Thanks.

reply.author: SoratSoft
reply.content: Thanks for reporting this issue. We are working hard on the fix.

title: On Marshmallow 6.0 app controls freeze/app hangs often

author: jose zuniga
comment: I hope it gets fix soon so I don't have to find a new app.
title: Nexus 5x crash.

author: Tony Thai
comment: With the new feature for smart watches this app just blew my mind. So cool I can see my IP cameras from my watch!
title: Works great on LG Watch R

author: SANJAY BATHIA
comment: Install but how to see outside house.go to monitoring option web browser opened but user name password asking.how can I use the camera view out side my house

author: K Pennett
comment: Can't complain, I haven't tried the wear app yet... 1st app the audio has worked with, & I believe I have a speaker in the cameras, but can't hear anything when I try & use the mic. but I may even purchase, if it remains reliable.. & I can figure out my port forwarding!
title: Works well, so far... (2 Wansview_NCB541W)

author: Emma LeBlanc
comment: Worked great with my older foscams.  Doesn't work with new HD cameras.  Moved onto other IP cam app that work with HD cameras no problem.

author: Frank Cosenza
comment: In description it says view camera's from anywhere. Doesn't work outside my house. I need it for when I'm away

author: Nikki hogan
comment: I put my ip in, no port number. I put in 80 & it wont even connect. Sad
title: Camt get it set up

author: Jerry Klein
comment: When I go into multi camera view it keeps crashing. Using Samsung 6S
title: It'OK

author: Jon Smith
comment: I entered the username and password correctly, this app, like several others, refused to recognize them. Uninstalling.
title: Another one that can't find my Foscams

author: Stephen Kidd
comment: Im using foscam an this app does all audio an ptz controller :-D
title: Great app best around
